name: @jurca/klondike
description: Klondike (AKA Canfield AKA Solitaire AKA American Patience) implementation in TypeScript, with separated logic and view, history of gameboard states and (some) configurable rules.

scripts.watch:seznam.cz-2020: NODE_ENV=development ENTRY_NAME=winnableGamesGenerator ENTRY_FILE=./ui/seznam.cz-2020/worker/winnableGamesGenerator.ts webpack && NODE_ENV=development ENTRY_NAME=main ENTRY_FILE=./ui/seznam.cz-2020/index.tsx webpack-dev-server --host ::
scripts.build:seznam.cz-2020: NODE_ENV=production ENTRY_NAME=winnableGamesGenerator ENTRY_FILE=./ui/seznam.cz-2020/worker/winnableGamesGenerator.ts webpack && NODE_ENV=production ENTRY_NAME=main ENTRY_FILE=./ui/seznam.cz-2020/index.tsx webpack && cd dist && posthtml index.html --use posthtml-inline-assets posthtml-minifier --posthtml-minifier.collapseWhitespace true --output solitaire.html && rm winnableGamesGenerator.js main.js index.html
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm test && npm run compile && mkdir dist/node_modules/ && cp -r node_modules/@jurca dist/node_modules && npm run bundle:minimalistic && cp ui/minimalistic/index.html dist/ui/minimalistic/

author: Martin Jurƒça <martin.jurca@firma.seznam.cz>
